title: _CLEAR_VEHICLE_TASKS
content:
0xDBBC7A2432524127// ClearVehicleTasks
void _CLEAR_VEHICLE_TASKS(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to have tasks clearedCLEAR_*

NativeDB Introduced: v1290
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for _CLEAR_VEHICLE_TASKS
_ClearVehicleTasks(vehicle)
